amendment.description: Amendment places limits on funding to jails, prisons, or other similar facilities that do not report to the Attorney General the death of any individual who dies in custody, and the circumstances surrounding that death.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require Federal, State, and local incarceration facilities to report to the Attorney General each occurrance of the death of an individual in custody.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hutchinson amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
